name: Paper Boat
description:
Paper Boat is one of two unofficial Global Game Jam 2018 entries created by 
@heyits5AM
@FINIFUGU
@JKBLilly
@Joel8Storm
@Andyesign

A short game about the aftermath of a flood, click on the lily pads to send waves and push the paper boat around, bump into different objects to see their story.

Controls: Mouse Click
